import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update organization type by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/organizations/types/{OrganizationTypeId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the name, scope, or site association for a single organization type. Use this when you need to rename a type or adjust its scope (Global vs Site).

**Prerequisites**
1. **OrganizationTypeId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/organizations/types/query](/docs/api/organizations/get-organization-types-by-query-get) and extract `Items[].OrganizationTypeId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify the OrganizationTypeId to modify.
2. Send [PUT /api/v1.0/organizations/types/\{OrganizationTypeId\}/update](/docs/api/organizations/update-organization-type) with the updated fields.

**Minimal Required Fields**: OrganizationTypeId path parameter; include fields you intend to update (Name, Scope, SiteId).

**Notes**: This API version is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"OrganizationTypeId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request body for creating or updating an organization type.","properties":{"OrganizationTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true},"Scope":{"type":"string","enum":["Global","Site"]},"Name":{"type":"string"}},"title":"UpdateOrganizationTypeRequest"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}

>
